channel.title: Karpoke - Just another Pelican blog - historia de android

item.title: The history of Android: The endless iterations of Google’s mobile OS
item.description: Android has been with us in one form or another for more than six years. During that time, we’ve seen an absolutely breathtaking rate of change unlike any other development cycle that has ever existed. When it came time for Google to dive in to the smartphone wars, the …
item.dc:creator: Nacho Cano
